Meet The Stray
遇见流浪者
What dark desire animates this cold-hearted killer?
这一冷血杀手有着怎样的黑暗欲望？

Marsh Davies 马什·戴维斯
Stay alert as you travel through the frozen landscape: there are more deadly things here than the cold! Lurking in the snow are strays - ragged wanderers with baleful eyes and deadly bows, ever on the lookout for foolish warm-bloods intruding into their territory. And beware! Those arrowheads will do more than stick you - their icy tips will cast a freezing pall, slowing their hapless victim to a frosty shuffle.
穿过严寒地区时请保持警惕：那里有着比寒冷还要致命的东西！在雪地深处潜藏着流浪者 —— 衣衫褴褛的漂泊之者，有着凶残的眼睛和致命的弓，探寻着闯入它们领地内的愚蠢的恒温动物。注意！它们的箭不仅能刺穿你 —— 那些冰冷的箭头能够传递出刺骨严寒，拖拽着无辜受害者的步伐。

The main intention behind the stray was to add some variation to the kinds of mobs you encounter in different biomes - so that each area of the world feels distinct.
加入流浪者的主要目的，是为了让玩家能够在不同的生物群系中遇到不同种类的生物 —— 如此，世界的不同区域便能显得不同。
 Essentially the stray is a new kind of skeleton that will spawn in the frozen areas. 

They’re based on a concept that emerged from a game jam the Bellevue team had, where they were just adding a bunch of stuff to Minecraft - whatever they wanted. Jason Major made a bunch of cool mobs and I thought these particular ones fitted really well with what we were already planning. So we added them! 
—— Jens Bergensten
简单来说，流浪者是一种只生成在严寒地区的新的骷髅。

它们基于一个游戏制作比赛（game jam）中 Bellevue 队伍的想法。他们当时向 Minecraft 中加入了许多的东西 —— 想到什么加什么。Jason Major 制作了许多有趣的生物，其中有一些和我们正在计划的东西十分相称，于是我们加入了它们！
—— Jeb
If you do best one of these bowmen, you have a fair chance of looting them of spare arrows tipped with the slowing potion. Since strays aren’t themselves immune to it, turning their own magic against them might just give you a chance to escape!
如果你能打败这些弓箭手，你很有可能会获得到它们沾有缓慢药水的箭。由于流浪者它们自己也不免疫缓慢效果，以其人之箭还治其人之身也许可以给你逃跑的机会！

【梓榆译自官网 2016 年 12 月 14 日发布的 Meet The Stray；原作者 Marsh Davies】
